Welcome to simsoexp’s documentation!¶

Contents:

class simsoexp.simsodb.DBConfFile(db, testset, identifier)¶

Represents a configuration file taken from a remote Simso Experiment Database.

configuration¶
Returns:simso.configuration.Configuration – the Simso configuration object represented by this configuration file.
content¶
Returns:string – this configuration file’s XML content.
class simsoexp.simsodb.DBResults(db, identifier)¶

Represents a results set from a remote Simso Experiment Database. These results contains : - the scheduler and testset identifiers in the database used to build the experiment. - the resulting metrics

metrics¶
Returns:dict of dict – A dictionnary containing a set of metrics indexed by their name.
scheduler_id¶
Returns:int – The id of the scheduler used to build these results.
testset_id¶
Returns:int – The id of the testset used to build these results.
class simsoexp.simsodb.DBScheduler(db, identifier)¶

Represents a scheduler taken from a remote Simso Experiment Database.

class_name¶
Returns:string – the scheduler’s main class in the scheduler’s code
cls¶
Returns:type – the scheduler’s class object.
code¶
Returns:string – this scheduler’s python code
name¶
Returns:string – this scheduler visible name
class simsoexp.simsodb.DBTestSet(db, identifier)¶

Represents a test set taken from a remote Simso Experiment Database.

categories¶
Returns:list – This test set’s categories as a list.
conf_files¶
Returns:list – a list of DBConfFile object for each configuration file in this test set.
description¶
Returns:The description of the test set.
name¶
Returns:The name of the test set
class simsoexp.simsodb.Experiment(db, conf_files, scheduler)¶
Represent an experiment, which contains :
  • a set of configuration files
  • a scheduler
  • after run() : a set of metrics and results
run()¶

Runs the experiment and computes the metrics.

upload()¶

Uploads the experiment to Simso Experiment Database.

Take care : you won’t be able to upload your results if you used a custom test set.

class simsoexp.simsodb.SimsoDatabase(address, username=None, password=None)¶

A remote

categories()¶

Gets a list of all the test categories

categories_and_description()¶

Gets a list of tuples (category_name, description) for each test category.

result(identifier)¶

Gets a result set given its identifier in the database.

results(testset, scheduler)¶

Gets the results associated to the given testset and scheduler. These results have been obtained by running simso with the corresponding scheduler and testsets.

Parameters:
  • testset – A DBTestSet instance.
  • scheduler – A DBScheduler instance.
scheduler(identifier)¶

Gets a scheduler given its id in the database.

scheduler_by_name(name='')¶

Gets a list of DBScheduler objects matching the given name Usually there is only one matching result.

Parameters:name – The exact name of the schedulers to find.
testset(identifier)¶
Parameters:identifier (int) – The identifier of the testset to retrieve.
Returns:DBTestset – DBTestset instance whose id is identifier
testset_by_name(name)¶
Returns:DBTestset – DBTestset instance whose name is name
testsets(category='')¶

Gets a list of testsets given a category If no category is specified, all the testsets are displayed.

Parameters:category – the category of testsets to display.
upload_testset(name, description, categories, conf_files)¶

Uploads a test set with the given name, categories and configuration files (list of Configuration objects).
